revision.text:
{{Use dmy dates|date=January 2013}} {{Use Indian English|date=January 2013}} This '''list of IIM Calcutta alumni''' includes notable people from different walks of life who are alumni of [[Indian Institute of Management Calcutta]].
==Business== * [[Ajit Balakrishnan]], Founder and [[Chief Executive Officer]] (CEO) of [[Rediff.com]].<ref name="alu-aji_bal1">[http://ajitb.rediffiland.com//scripts/xanadu_diary_view.php?postId=1175607380 Rediffiland.com], Ajith Balakrishnan's Blog - IIM Calcutta convocation speech - 1 April 2007</ref> He is also the Chairman of the Board of Governors of IIM Calcutta.<ref name="alu-aji_bal2">[http://www.iimcal.ac.in/campus/bog/bog.doc Iimcal.ac.in]</ref> * [[Ashish Chauhan]], [[Managing Director]] (MD) and CEO, [[Bombay Stock Exchange]]<ref name="alu-ash_cha1">{{Cite web |url=http://www.bseindia.com/about/mgmteam.asp |title=Management Team (As of July 2011) |accessdate=5 September 2011 |publisher= [[Bombay Stock Exchange]] }}</ref> * [[Indra Nooyi]], Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, [[PepsiCo]]<ref name="alu-ind_noo1">[http://mba.yale.edu/leaders_forum/profiles/nooyi_indra_bio.shtml Leaders Forum, [[Yale School of Management]] - Indra Nooyi]</ref><ref name="alu-ind_noo2">[http://money.cnn.com/2006/08/14/news/companies/pepsico_ceo/index.htm CNN.com], IIM Calcutta - Alumni Spotlight - Indra Nooyi, new Chairman and CEO of [[Pepsico]]</ref> * [[Jessie Paul]], author and marketer<ref name="alu-jes_pau1">{{cite web|title=10 Reasons to Read Jessie Paul's No Money Marketing|url=http://business.in.com/article/appraisals/10-reasons-to-read-jessie-pauls-no-money-marketing/6072/1 |publisher=[[Forbes]] |accessdate=20 June 2012 |author=Vivek Kamath |date=29 October 2009}}</ref><ref name="alu-jes_pau2">{{cite news |title=Wipro's CMO Jessie Paul quits to start own venture|url=http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/Corporate-Announcement/Jessie-Paul-quits-Wipro-to-start-own-venture/articleshow/5213972.cms|work=[[The Economic Times]] |publisher=[[The Times Group]]|accessdate=20 June 2012|author=Shelley Singh|date=10 November 2009}}</ref> * [[P M Murty]], former MD and CEO of [[Asian Paints]]<ref name="alu-pm_mur1">{{Cite news |url=http://articles.economictimes.indiatimes.com/2011-07-27/news/29820740_1_margins-titanium-dioxide-price-increases |title=Retail demand is likely to be more or less normal: Asian Paints |author= |accessdate=20 June 2012 |publisher=[[The Economic Times]] |date=27 July 2011}}</ref> * [[Pradeep Gupta]], Chairman CyberMedia Group, Past Chairman PanIIT Alumni India * [[Rohit Pande]] CEO & co-founder of '''Classteacher Learning Systems''', innovator of [[ClassPad|Classpad Educational Tablet]] * [[Sabyasachi Hajara]], Chairman and Managing Director, [[Shipping Corporation of India]]<ref name="alu-sab_haj1">{{Cite web |url=http://www.indiainfoline.com/Research/LeaderSpeak/Mr.-Sabyasachi-Hajara-CMD-The-Shipping-Corporation-of-India/6252708 |title=Mr. Sabyasachi Hajara, CMD, The Shipping Corporation of India |author=Anil Mascarenhas & Hemant P. Maradia |accessdate=4 October 2011 |publisher= http://www.indiainfoline.com |date=25 November 2009}}</ref> * [[Shantanu Khosla]], MD of [[Procter & Gamble]] India * [[Shyam Srinivasan]], MD and CEO of [[Federal Bank]] * [[Srinath Narasimhan]], Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of [[Tata Teleservices]] * [[Sunil Duggal]], Chief Executive Officer of [[Dabur]]<ref name="alu-sun_dug">{{Cite news |url=http://www.financialexpress.com/news/iimc-alumni-to-meet-on-dec-22/186961/0 |title=IIM-C alumni to meet on December 22 |author= |accessdate=2 September 2012 |work=[[The Financial Express (India)|The Financial Express]] |date=18 December 2006 |location=Kolkata}}</ref> * [[Venkat Viswanathan]], CEO, [[LatentView|LatentView Analytics]]<ref>{{Cite news |url= http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/Mining-Big-Data/articleshow/10237389.cms |title= Mining Big Data |author= Narayanan Krishnaswami |accessdate= 9 February 2012 |work=[[The Times of India]] |date= 5 October 2011}}</ref> * [[Vikrant Bhargava]], Group Marketing Director, [[PartyGaming]]<ref name="alu-vik_bha1">[http://www.iimcal.ac.in/newsandevents/fullarticle.asp?id=269 IIMCal.ac.in], IIM-C alumnus joins as keynote presenter at World Poker Congress : Vikrant Bhargav</ref>
==Academics== * [[Dipesh Chakrabarty]], historian<ref name="alu-dip_cha1">{{Cite web |url=http://www.ias.edu/news/press-releases/2012/03/16/chakrabarty |title=Dipesh Chakrabarty Appointed to Faculty at Institute for Advanced Study |accessdate=20 June 2012 |publisher=[[Institute for Advanced Study]]}}</ref> * [[Gita Johar|Gita Venkataramani Johar]], Senior Vice Dean and Meyer Feldberg Professor of Business, [[Columbia Business School]], [[Columbia University]]<ref name="alu-git_joh">[http://www0.gsb.columbia.edu/whoswho/bio.cfm?ID=47 Gita Johar, Columbia Business School Faculty Staff Directory<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> * [[Krishna Palepu]], Ross Graham Walker Professor of Business Administration, [[Harvard Business School]] and Senior Adviser to the President for Global Strategy, [[Harvard University]]<ref name="alu-kri_pal1">{{Cite web |url=http://drfd.hbs.edu/fit/public/facultyInfo.do?facInfo=bio&facEmId=kpalepu |title=Biography - Krishna G. Palepu |accessdate=13 January 2012 |publisher= [[Harvard Business School]] }}</ref> * [[M. J. Xavier]], founding [[Director (education)|Director]] of [[Indian Institute of Management Ranchi]] * [[Mohanbir Sawhney]], McCormick Tribune Professor of Technology, [[Kellogg School of Management]]<ref name="alu-moh_saw">[http://www.kellogg.northwestern.edu/faculty/bio/sawhney.htm Mohanbir S. Sawhney]</ref> * [[Paul Shrivastava]], David O'Brien Distinguished Professor of Sustainable Enterprise, [[Concordia University]] * [[Prakash Apte]], academician; professor and former Director of [[Indian Institute of Management Bangalore]]<ref name="alu-pra_apt1">{{Cite news |url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2002-10-08/bangalore/27290927_1_prakash-g-apte-iimb-indian-institute |title=Prakash Apte is new IIM director |author= |accessdate=20 June 2012 |publisher=[[The Times of India]] |date=8 October 2002}}</ref> * [[Ramachandra Guha]], noted historian and author
==Literature== * [[Amish Tripathi]], novelist, author of the ''[[Shiva Trilogy]]''<ref name="alu-ami_tri1">{{Cite web |url=http://shivatrilogy.com/the-secret-of-the-nagas/about-author.html |title=The Author |accessdate=12 December 2011 |publisher= }}</ref><ref name="alu-ami_tri2">{{Cite news |url=http://www.indianexpress.com/news/shivadriven/843318/ |title=Shiva-Driven |author=Siddhartha Mathur |accessdate=1 February 2012 |publisher=[[The Indian Express]] |date=8 September 2011}}</ref> * [[Manreet Sodhi Someshwar]], novelist<ref name="alu-swa_kau1">{{Cite news |url=http://www.thehindu.com/life-and-style/metroplus/article3532655.ece |title=Weaving tales around the Taj |author=Sana Amirjanu Narayan |accessdate=2 September 2012 |publisher= [[The Hindu]] |date=15 June 2012}}</ref> * [[Swati Kaushal]], novelist<ref name="alu-swa_kau1">{{Cite news |url=http://www.nytimes.com/2006/03/19/books/review/19donadio.html |title=The Chick-Lit Pandemic |author=Rachel Donadio |accessdate=17 January 2012 |publisher= [[The New York Times]] |date=19 March 2006}}</ref><ref name="alu-swa_kau2">{{Cite web |url=http://www.swatikaushal.com/author.html |title=Swati |accessdate=17 January 2012 |publisher=http://www.swatikaushal.com }}</ref><ref name="alu-swa_kau3">{{Cite news |url=http://www.tribuneindia.com/2005/20050508/spectrum/book3.htm |title=http://www.tribuneindia.com/2005/20050508/spectrum/book3.htm |author=A large slice of cheer |accessdate=1 February 2012 |publisher=[[The Tribune]] |date=8 May 2005}}</ref>
==Government and politics== * [[Amolak Rathan Kohli]], former [[Governors of states of India|Governor]] of [[Mizoram]]<ref name="alu-amo_koh1">{{Cite web |url=http://mizoram.nic.in/gov/gov_kohli.htm |title=AMOLAK RATTAN KOHLI |accessdate=20 June 2012 |publisher=}}</ref>
==References== {{Reflist|20em}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:List Of Iim Calcutta Alumni}} [[Category:Indian Institute of Management Calcutta alumni|*]] [[Category:Lists of people by university or college in India|Indian Institute of Management Calcutta]] [[Category:Kolkata-related lists]]
